text: Eugenio Andres Santana Santana (born December 2, 1959 in Las Palmas) is a judo athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B2 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished third in the 78 Kg group. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished 5 in the up to Open group. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from the Canary Islands Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Eugenio Andres Santana Santana
